3: Pairing successful!
The frame's special configuration has been fully awakened. All signal tactics available for use!
I didn't think she could do it.
Transmit the new combat configuration to the Gray Raven Commandant, on the priority channel!
Understood!
At this sync rate, the frame's combat abilities will not be a problem. The real problem is...
The decay rate of the remaining memory data?
The system will shut down when all memory data is lost. It is unavoidable, irreversible. If even one enemy is left standing when that happens...
It will end in total failure.
I won't fail.
Such confidence.
I may not know where I am, or where you are.
But I will not fail.
...Lucia.
...So I see.
Light as a feather, the heavens within reach.
With renewed strength coursing through my frame, I punch through the gap held open by my companions. With the tower as my destination, I leap for the skies.
Commandant is there. They're all there.
There, at the top of the tower, is everything I've ever longed for.
I'm on my way, 【kuroname】.
